11.content: Maddie was behind the candy counter one day doing some hard thinking. Her parents had split up half a year ago and Maddie had begun eating like a pig shortly after and had begun to get chunky. In the 6 months since then, she had gained 50 lbs. Her belly had begun to get a pouch, her legs had widened as had her hips, chest and butt. Her clothes were tight, and she had developed a second chin. Since then, she kept gaining for another year. After that, she had gained ....
11.title: Maddie

choices: Nothing Happened, We have to drink more!
111.content:
Maddie sighed as she saw that the scale had went up another 7 pounds since last week.
"What am I going to do!?" She screamed as London Tipton dazefully walked out of the elevator. "Hey Maddie!" She said cheerfully, "Whats up?"
"My Weight..." Maddie replied.
"Oh, Nothing to Worry about! Alot of guys are into fattys!" She said.
"really?"
"Nope!" She said still with a smile.
"Ohhhhhhhh." Maddie cried as she headbutted the table.
"Well Maddie, why are you worried about that?" She said.
"What are you blabbering on about? This is horrible!" She yelled.
"No it isn't! Gaining weight is in style! Infact, I ordered a bunch of fatty people foods by room service to plumpin' myself!" she said.
"Really?!" Maddie said smiling.
"Yeah, wanna come up?"
"O.K! How much are we gonna gain?" Maddie asked.
"Well PEOPLE says that anyone whos anyone is going 250 +. But I heard that Jessica Simpson is going immobile.
"Oh wow! Let's get started!" Maddie gleefully shouted.

UP IN LONDON'S SUITE....

As Maddie walked in she saw pile of burgers and fries and then in the corner she noticed a pile of jugs filled with orange liquid. "Hey London, whats the orange stuff?"
"Oh, thats called Maxy Gain 30x, it's a formula designed by Daddy's company so I can get super fat really quickly and not have to worry about health risks, yay me! She said as she clapped quickly.
"Awesome! Can I have some too?" Maddie asked.
"Of Course! We're gonna be the most in style girls, ever."
"Cheers to us then!" Maddie said pouring two glasses of the orange liquid.
They clanged the glasses and chugged it down all at once. Maddie stood there for a second, and then...
111.title: Fat is in Style.

13.content:
Carrie was a mother of two twins with deep red hair and a promising singing job with the Tipton. Carrie was coming down the elevator when purple smoke started coming through the vent! "What is all this!?" She yelled as she coughed the smoke in. But as quickly as the smoke was there it was gone! "That was weird" she said.

Little did Carrie know, that the smoke made her...
13.title: Carrie

132.content:
Carrie woke up in the middle of the night to a groaning stomach she decided to go into the kitchen to grab some food. She grabbed a tub of ice cream and a spoon and sat on the floor eating the ice cream after a half an hour she finished the tub of ice cream and headed up to get more food she then found a roll of frozen cookie dough she began to eat the cookie dough she continued this cycle for a little while until finally she felt full and went to bed.

The next morning Carrie woke up and headed out to the kitchen and was surprised to find that Zach had made a rather large breakfast and had also dissapeard she thought it was trick then realized it was prolly for something he did so she went over to the table and began eating she had a ton of pancakes and waffles then some sausages along with eggs and of course a ton of bacon after that Carrie leaned back and examined her body. Her stomach had become very large and doughy her thighs had become very large and soft and her breast had gone up a cup size she was starting to like her new body then she stood up and realized her ass had gotten huge.
132.title: Gain Weight Slowly but continuously.

It was now the dawn of morning. Crrie had just yelled breakfast for the boys. They both slowly got out of bed. They wore boxers and no shirt. Zack had been on a diet for a month. He was now as skinny as cody was a month ago. Wait a month ago? Well what about cody now?
Well..... he was 10 times fatter than Zack used to be, meaning he was really fat. Cody was now about 6 ft tall. Zack was 5 ft 2! Cody's belly was huge and extended! He weighed about 350 pounds and he was 14! So what happens next?
